snippet: Orthodox Christians who oppose European integration marched through the capital to denounce homosexuality, which they said would accompany a closer European alliance.
abstract: Pro-government demonstrators in Ukraine march through streets of Kiev to oppose homosexuality, which they say would accompany greater European Union role there, as part of new tactic to counter protests in favor of European integration.
lead_paragraph: Orthodox Christians who oppose European integration marched through the capital to denounce homosexuality, which they said would accompany a closer European alliance.

headline.main: Pro-Government Ukrainians Take to Streets to Denounce European Social Values
headline.print_headline: Pro-Government Ukrainians Take to Streets to Denounce European Social Values
